channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- PowerPath Management Appliance
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- PowerPath Management Appliance

item.title: CVE-2021-43587|2024-09-17T03:44:02.072Z -- dell -- powerpath%20management%20appliance
item.description: Dell PowerPath Management Appliance, versions 3.2, 3.1, 3.0 P01, 3.0, and 2.6, use hard-coded cryptographic key. A local high-privileged malicious user may potentially exploit this vulnerability to gain access to secrets and elevate to gain higher privileges.
